document_data.mainbody:
Armors of comfort were enchanted sets of heavy armor that were masterfully crafted to be soft and comfortable on the inside.
Armors of comfort were constructed of interlocking iron plates, greaves, and gauntlets, seemingly heavy and unwieldy. However, once the armor was put on, it felt light and comfortable, as if nothing more than a soft tunic. These sets of amore were even magically scented with lavender to hide the wielders bodily odors.
Armors of comfort possessed potent +2 protective enchantments and boosted the wearers healing, both skills and spells.
In the , Neurik of Port Llasts temple of Tyr offered a set of armor of comfort for sale.
